Name: CallsInConversation
Description: Number of calls within an async API conversation.

Name: Client
Description: Specifies the account ownership and context of an object.

Name: ConversationID
Description: Unique ID of initial async API call.

Name: RequestType
Description: Defines request as synchronous or asynchronous API.

Name: ScheduledTime
Description: Keeps requests in asynchronous queue until time specified in the call.

Name: SendResponseTo
Description: Defines how responses are returned and under what conditions.

Name: SequenceCode
Description: Specifies the processing sequence of a multi-step conversation.
